name: FALL BLOCK
description:
FALL BLOCK

---------------------------------------------------

TUTORIAL:

LEFT & RIGHT ARROW KEYS: MOVE THE PLAYER LEFT AND RIGHT

UP ARROW KEY: JUMP

SPACE BAR: SHOOT

---------------------------------------------------

GAME TARGET:

In this game, you have to survive more time possible. Avoid, shoot and destroy red blocks falling down, and don't fall in lava! 

When a red block hits a platform block, it will fall down in lava.

you've got a limit of 200 ammo. Every random between 20 and 40 seconds will be added 5 ammo to your counter.

You've got 3 lives. If a red block hits you, you'll lose 1 life.

---------------------------------------------------
